newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Oct 10.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Oct 10.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- Enquiry into misuse of funds at ARC cancer research charity alleges hundreds of million of francs were embezzled.
-- Head of SNCF state railway Louis Gallois says rail operator to cut prices to compete with road and air traffic
-- Workers at Alcatel CIT telecommunications equipement manufacturer worried about possible job cuts as activity proves sluggish.
